ygData.subject: OOC: Music interest
ygData.msgSnippet: Music has always been a huge part in my life.  I ve been in and out of bands for years, helped with distro and recordings and such, put out my own music zine,
ygData.messageBody:
Music has always been a huge part in my life. I've been in and out of
bands for years, helped with distro and recordings and such, put out my
own music zine, organize shows in my area, all sorts of fun stuff. I
can play guitar, bass, a little bit of drums, and a couple brass
instruments (but not well enough yet.. been working on trombone mostly).
I've mostly stuck to punk rock, as it's the one music style that appeals
to me the most, altho I also dabble in 80's pop,
ska/skapunk/skacore/etc, and a few oldies covers for fun. Overall, I
can't see myself giving up music anytime soon, it's always been one of
my favorite hobbies and a very large part of my life. Playing a bard
wasn't even a choice for me, it was automatic. *shrugs*
Take care!


Little green balls of mushy poison and other vegetables,
Zen Tormey
Lokar of the Soerbaird (Fennin Ro)
www.soerbaird.com



This message was sent from Castle Rock BBS - telnet casrock.com
